District 1
==========

![Councilmember Jeff Casper profile photo](https://www.cityofmesquite.com/ImageRepository/Document?documentID=29751 "Councilmember Jeff Casper profile photo")





1. **Jeff Casper**
   **Councilmember, District 1**
   Current Term Expires: November 2027
   [Email District 1](mailto:district1@cityofmesquite.com)

   Ph: 214-577-2018

   **Mailing Address**
   City of Mesquite
   P.O. Box 850137
   Mesquite, TX 75185-0137

About Jeff Casper
=================

* Mesquite resident for 30 years

* M.Ed., Educational Leadership and Public Policy, 2015, University of Texas at Arlington
* B.A., Political Science, 2009, University of North Texas

City of Mesquite
----------------

* Councilmember Place 2, 2015-2019
* Mesquite Rodeo City Reinvestment Zone No. 1, City of Mesquite, Texas
* Towne Centre Reinvestment Zone No. 2, City of Mesquite, Texas
* Skyline Tax Increment Finance Reinvestment Zone No. 7, City of Mesquite, Texas
* Gus Thomasson Tax Increment Finance Reinvestment Zone No. 8, City of Mesquite, Texas
* Town East/Skyline Tax Increment Finance Reinvestment Zone No. 9, City of Mesquite, Texas
* Polo Ridge Reinvestment Zone No. 10, City of Mesquite, Texas
* Heartland Town Center Reinvestment Zone No. 11, City of Mesquite, Texas
* IH-20 Business Park Reinvestment Zone No. 12, City of Mesquite, Texas
* Spradley Farms Reinvestment Zone No. 13, City of Mesquite, Texas
* Alcott Logistics Station Reinvestment Zone No. 14, City of Mesquite, Texas
* Solterra Reinvestment Zone No. 15, City of Mesquite, Texas
* Mesquite ISD Strategic Planning Committee member 2017

* Former Historic Mesquite, Inc. Board Member
* Former member of various Site-Base Decision Committees for Mesquite ISD
* Charter Reform Committee member
